article: One night, a young school teacher had a dream.In his dream, an angel appeared and said to him, "You will be given a child who will grow up to become a world  _  .How will you prepare him so that he will realize his  _  , grow in confidence, be open-minded, and strong in character? In short, what kind of  _  will you provide so that he can become one of the truly  _  leaders?" The young teacher  _  .It had never  _  to him before --- any one of his present or future students could be the person  _  .Was he preparing them to  _  to any position which they want? He thought, "How might my  _  change if I knew that one of my students was this person?" He  _  began to develop a plan in his mind. His teaching  _  Every young person who walked through his  _  became, for him, a future world leader.He saw each one, not as they were, but as they could be.He  _  the best from his students, yet tempered it with compassion .He taught each one  as if  the future of the world depended on his instruction. After many years, a man he taught rose to a  _  of world prominence .Of all the various teachers in his life, he was the  _  . Children are  _  messages we send to a time and place we will never see.Believe that one child's  _  may depend upon influence only you can provide, and something remarkable will  _  For no young person will ever be  _  to you again.And you will never be the same.
